title: Apokalyptic Raides radio show sept 12 2007 chmr fm
description:
Tune in to CHMR(93.5 fm) Wednesdays from 11-12am for Apocalyptic Raids. An hour of Crust, Grind, Power Violence, Thrash, H/C, Black Metal, NWOBHM, Crossover, Folk, and Punk Rock

This week I\\\&#039;ll be playing:
Muckspreader-Brit crust featuring Spider from Amebix
Extinction Of Mankind-Heavy as shit Metallic Crust
Villains-Punk as fuck New York Black Thrash
Judge Dread-Local assholes have a new 7"
Vomit-Punk as fuck Norwegian Death/Thrash from the 80&#039;s
Shoot It Up-Sloppy, Snotty Raging Punk Rock
Docent Dod-Early 80&#039;s Swedish Pop Punk

Here&#039;s this weeks full playlist:

Dead Moon-It&#039;s a long way to the top if you want to rock&#039;n&#039;roll
Docent Dod-Sloglasogon
Suspected Terrorist-I walk the earth
Ballast-Look away
Muckspreader-Hellraiser
React-Lost circles
Extinction Of Mankind-Life should mean life
Dekapitator-Toxic Sanctuary
Vomit-Armies of hell
Slaughter-Strappado
Darkthrone-Canadian Metal
Villains-Seduce and destroy
Judge Dread-Flick the switch
Under Pressure-Tranquilizer
Shoot It Up-Bringing me down
The Shitheads-My boyfiends back
Detention-Dead rock&#039;n&#039;rollers
Grimskunk-Vikings
